hero.headline: Stop sending applications into the void
hero.subtitle: You have the skills. You shouldn't have to spend hours rewriting your CV for every job. TripaliumAI finds matching positions, tailors your documents, and applies for you.
hero.trust: Free to start. No credit card required.

problem.title: You deserve better than this
problem.subtitle: If any of this sounds familiar, you're not alone.

pain1.title: Hours lost to repetition
pain1.description: Reformatting your CV, rewriting your cover letter, filling out the same fields over and over. Every application feels like starting from scratch.

pain2.title: One-size-fits-all documents
pain2.description: Sending the same generic CV everywhere because you don't have time to tailor each one. You know it hurts your chances, but what else can you do?

pain3.title: Silence after applying
pain3.description: You put in the work, click submit, and hear nothing. It's hard to stay motivated when your effort seems to disappear into a black hole.

howItWorks.title: Three steps. Then let us handle it.
howItWorks.subtitle: Get from signup to your first applications in under 10 minutes.

step1.title: Upload your CV
step1.description: Drop in your existing resume. Our AI reads it and builds your professional profile automatically — skills, experience, education, all structured and ready.

step2.title: Tell us what you're looking for
step2.description: Choose your target roles, preferred locations, salary range, and contract type. Set it once, and we search continuously.

step3.title: Review and apply
step3.description: We find matching jobs, generate tailored CVs and cover letters for each one, and present them for your review. Approve with one click.

features.title: Everything you need, nothing you don't
features.subtitle: Built for job seekers who want results without the busywork.

matching.title: Intelligent job matching
matching.description: Our AI compares your profile against every job posting. You set the match threshold — only relevant positions make it through.

documents.title: Documents that fit the job
documents.description: Each application gets a CV and cover letter crafted specifically for that role. Your experience is highlighted in the way that matters most to each employer.

control.title: You stay in control
control.description: Nothing gets sent without your approval. Review every document, edit if you want, then confirm. Practice mode lets you test the whole flow before going live.

sources.title: Multiple job boards, one dashboard
sources.description: We search across Welcome to the Jungle, Indeed, RemoteOK, and more. All your applications tracked in one place.

stat1.label: Setup time
stat1.description: From signup to your first automated applications

stat2.label: Your control
stat2.description: Every application reviewed by you before sending

stat3.label: Job sources
stat3.description: Indeed, WTTJ, RemoteOK, and more searched at once

finalCta.title: Your next job is out there. Let's go find it.
finalCta.description: Stop spending your evenings rewriting cover letters. Set up your profile once, and let TripaliumAI handle the rest.

footer.tagline: Job search automation, powered by AI.
